attributes.action: uphold the banks practice of charging customers for the use of money which does not belong to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over 75% of customers never get a bank charge. If the current media furore causes charges to be removed then this could mean the end of free banking for those of us who don't incur charges. One final thought. Is it right that those who don't handle their accounts properly should be allowed to use money which is not theirs. The silent majority could be punished because of the transgressions of the few.
